entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
